I'm Venkat Chavan N

Data Engineer & AI Specialist

Get In Touch View My Work

About Me

Innovator. Developer. Dreamer.

A Master's student in Big Data and Artificial Intelligence at SRH Berlin, with strong hands-on experience in cloud-based ETL pipelines, open-source LLMs, and their real-world applications. Experienced in structuring data on the Google Cloud Platform using tools like BigQuery and Looker Studio. Passionate about developing interpretable AI solutions, particularly for autonomous systems and biomedical domains, and currently researching multi-agent learning.

My Creations

A selection of my proudest work.

Coordinated Multi-Agent Reinforcement Learning (Masters Thesis)

Designing a CMARL framework for autonomous vehicles to coordinate with human drivers in mixed-traffic environments using CARLA and PyTorch.

Learn More

E-Commerce Data Analysis Pipeline

Big-data analysis pipeline leveraging AWS services for scalable data processing and exploratory insights on e-commerce data.

Learn More

American Sign Language Detection System

CNN-based computer vision system for real-time American Sign Language gesture recognition with high accuracy performance.

Learn More

Crude Oil Price Prediction Model

Time series forecasting model for predicting crude oil prices using advanced machine learning and statistical techniques.

Learn More

CryptoApp - Mobile Encryption Tool

Android application for text encryption using Caesar Cipher and Binary Encryption algorithms with intuitive user interface.

Learn More

Divine Insights: NLP Analysis of the Bhagavad Gita

Conducted NLP analysis using VADER for sentiment analysis and a TF-IDF based Q&A system. Developed a RAG-based chatbot powered by Mistral 7B and LangChain.

Learn More

Enhanced Data Augmentation and Synthesis

Implemented RAG to enhance review datasets using FAISS for vector storage and Sentence-BERT for semantic embeddings.

Learn More
